example.name: layer-lhrh3
example.description: Demonstration of a melody spanning two staves, and layers on a single staff with stems going the same direction. Example from Beethoven's piano sonata no. 4 in E-flat major, op. 7, mvmt. 4: Rondo: Poco allegretto grazioso.

file.name: lhrh3.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: lhrh3.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
